idea-plugin.name: Money Never Sleeps
idea-plugin.description:
mns: Money Never Sleeps! IntelliJ IDEA platform plugin. Supports instant stock market from USA, HK and China mainland.
IntelliJ IDEA 平台插件, 支持股票行情数据的实时更新, 包括美股, 港股和宇宙第一大A股!.
Money never sleeps, NEITHER do We!
金钱永不眠, 我们也不睡!
Good luck!
使用说明: https://github.com/bytebeats/mns
